an4.206:1: "Bhikkhus, I will teach you about the bad person and the person inferior to the bad person; about the good person and the person superior to the good person. Listen and attend closely; I will speak."
an4.206:2: (1) "And who, bhikkhus, is the bad person?Here, someone is of wrong view … wrong concentration, wrong knowledge, and wrong liberation. This is called the bad person.
an4.206:3: (2) "And who is the person inferior to the bad person? Here, someone is himself of wrong view and encourages others in wrong view … he is himself of wrong liberation and encourages others in wrong liberation. This is called the person inferior to the bad person.
an4.206:4: (3) "And who is the good person? Here, someone is of right view … right concentration, right knowledge, and right liberation. This is called the good person.
an4.206:5: (4) "And who is the person superior to the good person? Here, someone is himself of right view and encourages others in right view … he is himself of right liberation and encourages others in right liberation. This is called the person superior to the good person."
